WARNING: This file contains words that may be considered offensive.

Comments.Why does this file exist?: This list is for words that do not need to be censored when servers enable the "moderate" filter.
Comments.What's below: Below are words that will not be censored when using the "moderate" filter, but will be censored when using the "strict" filter.
Comments.''Nipple'', ''nipples'': While nipple can be used in a sexual way, it's a body term that can become a false positive when the conversation is about body parts.
Comments.''Piss'', ''pissing'': While piss is known as a vulgar term, it doesn't need to be in the moderate list.
